thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Connect Group Says Aurelius Failed To Complete Transaction Before Agreed Deadline

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Connect Group Says Aurelius Failed To Complete Transaction Before Agreed Deadline

organizations.name: brief-connect group says aurelius failed to complete transaction before agreed deadline feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Connect Group Plc:
* UPDATE ON THE DISPOSAL OF THE BOOKS DIVISION * ‍UPDATE ON DISPOSAL OF BOOKS DIVISION TO AURELIUS EQUITY OPPORTUNITIES​
* AURELIUS FAILED TO COMPLETE TRANSACTION BEFORE AGREED DEADLINE OF MIDNIGHT ON JAN 31, AS IT WAS OBLIGATED TO DO UNDER TERMS OF SPA​
* ‍CONSIDERING WITH ITS ADVISERS WHAT ACTION IT WILL NOW TAKE IN LIGHT OF THIS DEVELOPMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
